title: Reawakened
description: Each new day the sun shines across Chicago, but not for Clare. Until recently, she felt she had it all. Then tragedy struck, and Clare was left alone, heartbroken. When a gorgeous 'grease monkey' enters her life, along with a shocking discovery, Clare must quickly learn to allow the light back in her heart, or she risks living in the darkness forever. Love can heal all wounds - if she lets it.
author: Janine Kane
